column5: I traded a Minn Kota PD 50 for a new Motor Guide 75 Wireless 24 volt and 6 hours seems to be about the length of battery power and prop stops, the MK 55 used to last me 2 days & some times more of the same fishing, I'm thinking the batteries should last longer, any thoughts, I always had 2 batteries hooked up before in line Richard
Have the batteries load tested. You should get more than 6 hours.
it is a much more powerful motor, and it's wireless, so you'll be chewing through the batteries a lot quicker... but that being said, you should still get way more than 6 hours out of it...
